name: Dr.Regis Anne W
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Physics )  - Fatima College,Madurai   - 1998M.C.A  - Thiagarajar college of Engineering   - 2001Ph.D  ( Computer Science )  - Bharathiar University  - 10/16/2017Supervisor: Dr.Elijah Blessing
in_brief: Dr.W.Regis Anne, is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences.  She earned a  Ph.D degree in Computer Science from Bharathiar University for her works in the area of Wireless Sensor Networks. She has over 17 years of experience in  teaching .  She has published papers in various reputed national and international journals. She is also a reviewer for various International Journals. Her current research includes Deep Learning and  Data Analytics.

publications.title: A recent review of ransomware attacks on healthcare industries
